description.zh-CN: 北欧哲学风格，采用最小化美学和自然原始材质。强谾功能性、永恒简洁美和斯堪地纳维亚美学。斯堪的纳维亚设计哲学采用极简美学和原材料。强调功能性和自然美感。
description.en-US: Scandinavian design philosophy with minimalist aesthetics, natural raw materials, and functional simplicity Creates warm, inviting interfaces through clean layouts, natural wood textures, and hygge-inspired coziness reflecting authentic Nordic design traditions Creates warm, minimalist Nordic design experiences Perfect for home applications, lifestyle brands, and hygge-inspired design This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. timeless simplicity and functional beauty. Delivers exceptional visual quality and sophisticated design excellence.

title.zh-CN: 斯堪的纳维亚室内设计
